sentences.en: a beech dining table with four chairs to match (= chairs that match it )
sentences.cn: 配有四把椅子的山毛榉餐桌

sentences.en: a box of matches
sentences.cn: 一盒火柴

sentences.en: a new coat and a hat to match.
sentences.cn: 一件新上衣和一顶相配的帽子。

sentences.en: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.cn: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

sentences.en: Do you think this outfit matches?
sentences.cn: 你认为这套衣服配吗？

sentences.en: He finally faltered in the last game of a heroic match.
sentences.cn: 他在这场艰苦比赛的最后一局中踉跄结束。

sentences.en: He is leaving tomorrow to play his first match.
sentences.cn: 他明天将出发去参加他的首场比赛。

sentences.en: He struck a match, and held it at arm's length.
sentences.cn: 他划亮一根火柴，伸长胳膊举着。

sentences.en: Helen's choice of lipstick was a good match for her skin-tone.
sentences.cn: 海伦选择的唇膏很适合她的肤色。

sentences.en: I tend to get very uptight during a match.
sentences.cn: 比赛时我总会紧张得不行。

sentences.en: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.cn: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.en: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.cn: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.en: Our value system does not match with their value system.
sentences.cn: 我们的价值体系和他们的并不相同。

sentences.en: Poland provide the opposition for the Scots' last warm-up match at home.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队在国内最后一场热身赛的对手是波兰队。

sentences.en: she matches up to the challenges of the job.
sentences.cn: 她能适应这项工作的考验。

sentences.en: Swiss fans cheered Jakob Hlasek during yesterday's match with Courier.
sentences.cn: 昨天，瑞士球迷在雅各布·赫拉塞克对阵库里耶的比赛中为赫拉塞克喝彩加油。

sentences.en: The goal that decided the match came just before the interval.
sentences.cn: 决定本场比赛结果的进球是在中场休息前一刻打入的。

sentences.en: The match is off because of a waterlogged pitch.
sentences.cn: 由于场地积水太多比赛被取消了。

sentences.en: The match will be refereed by Derek Bevan from Wales.
sentences.cn: 这场比赛将由来自威尔士的德里克·贝文执法。

sentences.en: They almost won the match in the closing minutes.
sentences.cn: 最后几分钟的时候他们差一点赢了这场比赛。

sentences.en: They are both very vital people and a good match.
sentences.cn: 他俩都很有活力，十分般配。

sentences.en: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.en: This is something of a grudge match against a long-term enemy.
sentences.cn: 这可以说是一场与宿敌你死我活的比赛。

sentences.en: try if you can to match her with a duke.
sentences.cn: 可能的话你尽量把她嫁给一位公爵。

sentences.en: We painted our table to match the window frame in the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们把桌子刷成与卧室窗框一致的颜色。

sentences.en: We painted the cabinets green to match the rug.
sentences.cn: 我们把柜子刷成绿色，和地毯相配。

words.tran_cn: 火柴制造的；火柴制造者的
[计] 匹配程序；制榫机；匹配器
媒人；安排比赛的人；火柴制造者
做媒；火柴制造；安排比赛
比赛，竞赛；匹配；对手；火柴
比赛；匹配；相配，相称；相比
使比赛；使相配；敌得过，比得上；相配；与…竞争

phrases.tran_cn: 比赛；进行一场比赛；举行一场比赛
比洞赛（一种高尔夫球比赛方式）；对抗赛；一对一比赛
比赛中为获胜所必需的最后一分；决胜点
遇到实力相当的对手，棋逢敌手

trans.tran_cn: 比赛，火柴，敌手，相配的人/物，相似的东西，婚姻
trans.tran_en: an organized sports event between two teams or people

trans.tran_cn: 与…相称，相似，配对，比得上，使较量，使优于，适应
trans.tran_en: if one thing matches another, or if two things match, they look attractive together because they are a similar colour, pattern etc
